title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Prescription Drug Take Back Day To Fight The Scourge Of Drug Abuse Across The Country â€“ The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
April 26, 2018
My administration is committed to fighting the drug epidemic and helping get treatment for those in need.
						President Donald J. Trump					NATIONAL PRESCRIPTION DRUG TAKE BACK DAY: A national day to ask all Americans to safely dispose of unneeded medication.RISKS OF KEEPING PRESCRIPTION DRUGS: From ingesting out-of-date prescription drugs to abuse and misuse of prescriptions, keeping unneeded prescriptions poses a number of risks.
